=================



* [City Projects](https://www.weslacotx.gov/government/open_government/city_projects.php)

* State of The City

The City of Weslaco and Mayor Adrian Gonzalez would like to thank everyone who contributed to the success of this year's State of the City event. Watch the video to hear the 2024 State of the City address.
**[2024 State of the City](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ckvWc-zVMZA)**
